title: Replication data for: Heterogeneous Treatment Effects in Impact Evaluation
creator: Eva Vivalt
description: It is very important to know how much we can extrapolate from a study's results. This paper examines the issue using data from impact evaluations in development.
subject: C21 Single Equation Models; Single Variables: Cross-Sectional Models; Spatial Models; Treatment Effect Models; Quantile Regressions
